title: How to change the username on your PS4's PlayStation Network service in 2 ways
text:
Sony has recently changed its policy to allow you to change your PSN name on a PS4, which was previously permanent once you made an account.

You can change your name from the PS4 console, or on the web. Either way, the first name change is free, but Sony charges a fee for additional changes.

Some games and services might not work properly once you change your name, so consider it carefully before you make the change.

Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories.

If you're unhappy with the name you created for your PlayStation Network account, you're not alone. Your name used to be permanent, but so many people complained about their permanent PSN name that Sony relented earlier this year, and now PS4 users finally have the ability to change their name.

There are two ways to change your name: using the PS4 console or in a web browser.

In both cases, there are some risks. As Sony tells you before you make a change to your PSN name, not all games and services may work properly once you change your name, and it could possibly result in the loss of some saved game data.

You get to make one free PSN name change, but subsequent name changes cost $10 each.

Check out the products mentioned in this article:

How to change your PSN name on a PS4

1. On your PS4, select "Settings."

Start the process of changing your PSN name by opening Settings on your console. Dave Johnson/Business Insider

2. Select "Account Management."

3. Select "Account Information."

4. Select "Profile."

5. Select "Online ID."

You can change your PSN name by choosing Online ID in Settings. Dave Johnson/Business Insider

6. You may be asked to verify your account by entering your password. If so, complete the sign-in process with your password.

7. Acknowledge the risks involved in changing your PSN name — select "I accept," and on the next page, "Continue."

8. On the Online ID page, enter a new PSN name and follow the instructions to make the change.

9. Confirm that you want to make the change.

Enter your new name and choose "Confirm" to complete the process. Dave Johnson/Business Insider

How to change your PSN name in a web browser

1. In a browser, go to Sony's PSN sign-in page and log in with your PSN email address and password.

2. Click "PSN Profile."

After logging into your Sony account, click "PSN Profile." Dave Johnson/Business Insider

3. To the right of Online ID, click "Edit."

Click "Edit" to change your PSN name. Dave Johnson/Business Insider

4. Acknowledge the risks involved in changing a PSN name — select "I accept," and on the next page, "Continue."

5. On the Change Online ID page, enter the name you want to use and follow the instructions to complete the change.
